revised_title: The Effect of Diffusion on Flame Speeds in Gases
tldr: This article investigates the effect of diffusion of main reactants on flame speeds in gases. The author presents a method of successive approximation to solve the equations with diffusion, providing a solution for the speed of a flame maintained by a single reaction. The study focuses on a single exothermic chemical reaction and considers the diffusion of the main reactants and products.
